title: Wherever more than the minimum front and marginal spaces have been provided, such additional area provided may be considered wherever necessary, as part of the amenity open space under the URS comprising both rehabilitation and incentive FSI components, without charging any premium, in relaxation of the stipulation in Regulation No
clause_text: Wherever more than the minimum front and marginal spaces have been provided, such additional area provided may be considered wherever necessary, as part of the amenity open space under the URS comprising both rehabilitation and incentive FSI components, without charging any premium, in relaxation of the stipulation in Regulation No. 27.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
